alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 10:46AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wayne, southeastern Oakland and southwestern Macomb Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1046 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Royal Oak, or near Troy, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warren around 1050 AM EDT. Detroit around 1055 AM EDT. Grosse Pointe and Dearborn around 1100 AM EDT. Downtown Detroit and Belle Isle around 1105 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lathrup Village, Bingham Farms, Harper Woods, Pleasant Ridge, Ecorse, Center Line, Huntington Woods, Grosse Pointe Woods, Grosse Pointe Park and Highland Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
